snippet.title: Amy (Sonic) vs Tentacle Monster - Project X : Love Potion Disaster - PC gameplay - Zeta Team
snippet.description:
Gaming news and reviews: https://schiller19gaming.com/

Project X: Love Potion Disaster is a sonic clone developed by Zeta Team (no relation to sega whatsoever). The characters are from the Sonic franchise (we have Amy in this video) and gameplay is of a classic 2D beat-em-up side scroller.
All the monsters have special attacks and you can check them out if you try the game yourself.
You can find the game by searching for the developer and the name of the game. It is free to download and playable on windows and on mac.
Ganeplay is captured on the PC.


Don't forget to subscribe to my new channel schiller19, and activate the notification bell in order to receive updates from me faster.

#ProjectX #LovePotionDisaster #AmySonic
